front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for N Times 64 Kilobit Per Second Optical Fiber Interfaces Between Teleprotection and Multiplexer Equipment

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An optical interface for use between teleprotection and digital multiplexer equipment that can operate at a data rate of N times 64 kilobit per second where N = 1, 2 12 is described. Requirements for both physical connection and the communications timing are also included.
